name: Quadratic squared
description:
Short Puzzle game for lost relic game jam.

My first puzzle game, also my first time writing music. 

IT IS RECOMMEND THAT THIS GAME BE PLAYED ON FULL SCREEN.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Jump

E - Interact with things

Q - Change between players

R - Restart current level

Credits:

Sounds: https://www.soundsnap.com/ and audacity

Music: Made using LMMS

Art: Aesprite
